Service Details: - Offers learning through volunteer service programs for young Canadians looking for a unique experience that enables them to make positive change in their lives and in communities- Develops valuable, transferable employment skills, and focuses on development of lifelong personal, professional and social competencies in civic engagement, autonomous living, healthy lifestyle and environmental stewardship
How to Apply: Please visit the website for details on current programs, fees, and application
